name: Campfire (XenosNS)
description:
Tell a scary ghost story around the campfire by matching four characters. Avoid sleeping campers or taking too long else the campers will get bored.

(Note: Chrome is the recommended browser as Firefox does not always work)

Design and programming by XenosNS
Design and artwork by rogueNoodle

Created for the Halifax Game Collective game pagent with the theme of "Ghost Stories."

https://hgcgamejams.wordpress.com/2015/02/26/pageant-d-ghost-stories/

Uses the Match3 gml engine by Software4me
http://gmc.yoyogames.com/index.php?showtopic=624957

Music
http://opengameart.org/content/osare-unrest-theme

Campfire sound
http://www.freesound.org/people/Sauron974/sounds/204348/
